substitution.copyText: Stay , give me drink, Hamlet this pearl is thine,
substitution.amendedText: Stay , give me the cup, Hamlet this pearl is thine,

substitution.copyText: He's fat and seant of breath| Here Hamlet, Take my Handkerchief; wipe day brows
I will my lord, I pray you pardon me.
I dare not drink yet Madam, by and by.| Come let me wipe thy face.
Come, for the third Laertes, you do but dally,
substitution.amendedText: Come, for the third Laertes, you but dally

substitution.copyText: Look to the Queen there ho.
They bleed on both sides, how is't my Lord
Why as a woodclock in mine own sprindge Ostrick,
substitution.amendedText: Why as a woodclock caught in mine own sprindge Ostrick,

substitution.copyText: She swoons to see them bleed.
